title: NIE Notification 2026 - Apply Online for Young Professional -I Posts
description: The National Institute of Epidemiology, Chennai (NIE Chennai) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Young Professional -I Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed any degree can apply for the NIE Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, appl...
